band

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • band.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authenticatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Gig, Rehearsal

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authenticatable
    used to store information about a event; Event is an abstract class which implements all methods common to both Gig and Rehearsal
    Author:
    OOP Gruppe 187

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface auth.Authenticatable
